info.title: Policy Service
info.description: The policy service exposes HTTP API for executing policies.

get.description: Evaluate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

schema.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

schema.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

requestBody.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

schema.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

schema.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

ETag.example: Tempore vero illo deleniti quidem omnis vitae.

post.description: Evaluate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

schema.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

schema.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

requestBody.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

schema.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

application/json.example: Vitae praesentium ratione enim nihil sit explicabo.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

schema.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

ETag.example: Voluptas eum eaque sit eum similique est.

get.description: Evaluate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

schema.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

schema.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

requestBody.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

schema.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

schema.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.
schema.example: Eveniet excepturi repellendus similique in mollitia voluptas.

ETag.example: Harum non id sint iusto quaerat.

content-disposition.description: Content-Disposition response header containing the name of the file.

schema.description: Content-Disposition response header containing the name of the file.
schema.example: In voluptatem provident deleniti repellendus officia ut.

content-disposition.example: Id quo consequatur fuga laborum enim.

content-type.example: Ut aliquid pariatur et quo error.

delete.description: Unlock a policy so it can be evaluated again.

parameters.name: group
parameters.example: Impedit laudantium accusamus ut explicabo est.

post.description: Lock a policy so that it cannot be evaluated.

schema.example: Porro earum error quia provident non.

parameters.name: policyName

schema.example: Et quis fugit ipsam tempora consequatur.

parameters.example: Officiis natus illo ex in enim in.

parameters.name: version
parameters.example: Non et ut nihil voluptate consequuntur sunt.

post.description: Subscribe for policy change notifications by registering webhook callbacks which the policy service will call.

schema.example: Quos ex autem dolor voluptatem reiciendis assumenda.
Aperiam ratione enim qui omnis nihil dolorem.
Aut doloremque beatae non sed nihil perferendis.

application/json.example: Eligendi ad cum deleniti corrupti voluptatum optio.

get.description: Validate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input and validates the output schema.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

schema.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

schema.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

requestBody.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

schema.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.
schema.example: Qui et sit maiores architecto alias.

application/json.example: Ipsam ipsa quod eveniet velit voluptatem eligendi.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

schema.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

ETag.example: Natus voluptas enim nulla aut aut et.

get.description: List policies from storage with optional filters.

parameters.name: rego
parameters.description: Include policy source code in results (optional).

schema.description: Include policy source code in results (optional).

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Include policy static data in results (optional).

schema.description: Include policy static data in results (optional).
